hotels.title: Barossa Valley Heritage Vineyard Retreat in South Australia's Renowned Wine Region
hotels.description: Sample the best of South Australia’s wine region with a romantic cottage stay at Barossa Shiraz Estate. Set among acres of Barossa Valley vines, with views to the distant hills, your heritage cottage comes equipped with all you’ll need for a relaxing break. Cycle through the vineyards to visit cellar doors, before coming home to enjoy a sunset glass of wine on the verandah, soak in the spa bath or curl up by the fire. A Tripadvisor Travellers' Choice 2020 award-winner, Barossa Shiraz Estate is committed to making your winery escape extra special. Whether you'd like to arrange a cellar door tour, need restaurant recommendations, want to learn the art of winemaking or even soar across the scenic landscape in a helicopter, someone is always on hand to help you create a memorable experience. You're absolutely spoiled for choice when it comes to gourmet delights in the Barossa. Stroll to one of the fantastic restaurants within walking distance of the estate or discover iconic wine companies like Jacob’s Creek, Penfolds and Seppeltsfield nearby.

hotels.title: Heritage Barossa Valley Wine Country Retreat with Onsite Restaurant, Wine Cellar & Bush Bath
hotels.description: Embrace luxury at its finest at one of South Australia's most picturesque retreats, nestled amid riverbanks and rolling hills, in the renowned wine region of the Barossa Valley. Once the home of a 19th-century pastoralist, this 225-acre homestead has been beautifully restored to offer a gateway to the region's celebrated vineyards, and less than an hour from the bustling Adelaide CBD. Step into a world of signature Kingsford experiences: try a wine-tasting tour with the resident sommelier, explore the wine vaults, go on an ATV ride, try out Kegal in the onsite bowling alley or indulge in a 'Bush Bath' in the privacy of the great outdoors. Enjoy world-class wines, savour hearty plates at Orleana or sip on cocktails at the Peppertree Pool & Bar, for a truly indulgent escape.

hotels.title: Luxurious Vineyard-Framed Barossa Valley Escape with Award-Winning Appellation Restaurant
hotels.description: An opulent escape to the rolling hills of the Barossa Valley awaits at The Louise, an idyllic vineyard-framed lodge that delivers country luxury and gourmet dining. Flit from cellar doors and restaurants to vibrant farmers' markets and sophisticated art galleries as you explore what makes the Barossa Valley one of Australia's premier wine regions. Indulge in pre-dinner drinks before dining at multi-award-winning restaurant Appellation where the daily changing degustation menu is expertly paired with local wines. With a lavish in-suite bar replenished daily with delicious treats and the use of luxurious lodge facilities such as a wet-edge lap pool, fitness centre and sauna, an unforgettable stay is all but assured.
